summary: This is an email exchange regarding the Epstein death investigation, involving an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York. The email indicates coordination or communication about the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender/recipient of the email, identified as an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York, is involved in the Epstein death investigation.

events.title: Email Exchange on Epstein Death Investigation
events.description: An email exchange occurs regarding the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death, involving an Assistant United States Attorney.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 13, 2019, concerning the Epstein death investigation.
An Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York is involved in the correspondence.
The email indicates ongoing work and coordination regarding the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death.
